ie.js.description: Add support for Internet Explorer 10+ on desktop and Windows Phone 8

fx_methods.js.description: Animated show, hide, toggle, and fade*() methods.

assets.js.description: Experimental support for cleaning up iOS memory after removing image elements from the DOM.

data.js.description: A full-blown data() method, capable of storing arbitrary objects in memory.

deferred.js.description: Provides $.Deferred promises API. Depends on the "callbacks" module. $.ajax() supports a promise interface for chaining callbacks.

selector.js.description: Experimental jQuery CSS extensions support for functionality such as $('div:first') and el.is(':visible').

touch.js.description: Fires tap– and swipe–related events on touch devices. This works with both `touch` (iOS, Android) and `pointer` events (Windows Phone).

gesture.js.description: Fires pinch gesture events on touch devices

ios3.js.description: String.prototype.trim and Array.prototype.reduce methods (if they are missing) for compatibility with iOS 3.x.

polyfill.js.description: String.prototype.trim and Array.prototype.reduce methods (if they are missing) for compatibility with iOS 3.x.
